column4: Can anyone tell me if the Gusty install CD has been updated since its release? The current one downloads approx 150 updates totally over 200MB each install, which is a problem...
Why is it a problem? (HughesNet, probably, because their limit is 200mb)
- Because in the UK almost all ISP's have FUP... these mean that if you download too much you get your speed cut / disconnected... 200MB of updates on several machines can eaisly hit this limit
